title: Fintex - Concept Fintech App
description: Fintex: A Concept Fintech App with Flutter. This is a demonstrator project where animated user interactions are implemented with proper state management.

title: Swipe to complete - Open source package
description: This package imnplements a UI/UX concept of a widget that enables a user to swipe across the screen in a designated area to confirm a selection, post which a callback will be executed.

title: Reward Popup - Open source package
description: A flutter package to easily implement an attractive animated pop-up animation with gift and confetti animation.

title: Reactions Menu - Open source package
description: A highly customizable flutter package that helps you to easily implement actions - reactions overlay pop-up.

title: Swipe to go back - Open source package
description: A simple to use flutter package that helps you to implement swipe up or down to go back exactly like twitter.

title: Beacon - Location Tracking & Sharing App
description: Flutter app using Azure Maps for real-time location tracking. Users set sharing duration, initiate tracking, receive unique session ID ("BCode") that can be shared
